verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: Standing, standing,
standing on the promises of God my Saviour;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Standing, standing,
I’m standing on the promises of God.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: Standing on the promises of Christ my King,
Thro’ eternal ages let His praises ring;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Glory in the highest,
I will shout and sing,
standing on the promises of God.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Standing on the promises that cannot fail,
when the howling storms of doubt and fear assail,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
By the living word of God
I shall prevail,
standing on the promises of God.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: Standing on the promises of Christ the Lord,
bound to Him eternally by love’s strong cord,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: Overcoming daily with the Spirit’s sword,
standing on the promises of God.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Standing of the promises
I cannot fall,
listening every moment to the Spirit’s call,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Resting in my Saviour,
as my all in all,
standing on the promises of God.
